jobDescription: Position Associate Research Scientist Release Time 2017.09.14Opening 1Description Perform Gene synthesis procedures using Oligo design, PCR Cell culture, ligation/transformation, cell line selection, plasmids preparation, and QC testing; Perform real-time PCR amplification; Analyze ingredients using HPLC and SOPs in compliance with federal regulation; Reagents preparation and Final product packaging using liquid/multiphase mixing, sterilization/sanitation, filtration, centrifugation; Follow biology industry SOPs in compliance with federal regulation...
